Notes

[l=Specialty Records Corporation] pressing from [l211933] stampers, denoted by "AL-SP" etch in runouts and "E A S T" debossed in Side B pressing ring. Engineered at Advision Studio, London. A4 - Andy Mackay courtesy of Virgin Records Ltd. A2, B3 - Helena Springs courtesy of Arista Records Ltd. A1: Cage Music/Ten Music-ASCAP Orbob Music Inc. - ASCAP A2, A3, A5 to B6: Cage Music/Ten Music-ASCAP A4: Cage Music/Ten Music-ASCAP Unichappell Music/Charisma Music - BMI Cage Music/Ten Music-ASCAP Adm. by Virgin Music Inc. - ASCAP Orbob Music Inc. Adm by Ellipsis Music Corp. - ASCAP (All publishing info taken from the center labels) © ℗ 1986 except A2 and A3 ℗ 1985 EMI Records Ltd. Manufactured in the U.S.A. by Capitol Records, Inc., a subsidiary of Capitol Industries-EMI, Inc. Printed in U.S.A. 'Please' is a digital recording. "SLM △" in the runout etching indicates that the lacquer disc was processed at, and the metal parts used to manufacture the record were made at Sheffield Lab Matrix. Track B1 is not listed on the release but is a separate track at the start of side B. This track is titled "Opportunities (Reprise)" on CD pressings of the album. Printed inner sleeve with photos. Runout is etched except Mastered By... and Allied "ɑ" logo which are stamped.
